long_description: You enter into a large circular room, that's cold with just a few flickering candles. On the floor you notice markings in the shape of a summoning circle. As you draw near to inspect your breath leaves you, the room becomes unbearably cold and a Lich appears!
short_description: The final room with the Lich.

Lich.name: Lich
Lich.description: A floating skeleton enveloped in a tattered mage's robe, eyes glow with hatred, it points its staff at you as it becons you to join it in undeath.

Wizard.name: Wizard
Wizard.description: If the Boss is defeated, this special Wizard appears before hero and restores dungeon into a palace full of people.
